parsing_instructions.justification: The Adhyaya is divided into sequentially numbered units (1-15) which serve as the primary semantic and structural divisions, conventionally referred to as Mantras in Upanishads.

start_pattern.description: A Mantra technically starts immediately following the end marker of the previous Mantra. Often preceded by a bold topic heading in brackets.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Mantra is marked by double vertical bars enclosing the section number.
